core/console.name: core/console
core/console.description: Simple logging component that writes everything received on the input port to standard output stream.

inports.name: in
inports.description: Input port for logging IP

core/delay.name: core/delay
core/delay.description: Forwards received IP to the output with a specified delay

inports.name: in
inports.description: Input port for receiving IPs

inports.name: interval
inports.description: Configures the delay. Accepts durations in the format: 3s, 10m, etc

core/distinct.name: core/distinct
core/distinct.description: A filter component (either file-based or memory-based) that passes through only unique IPs (keeps a complete history of IPs)

inports.name: options
inports.description: Port for options to configure the component. E.g. {'storage':'file or memory', 'file':'/path/to/cache/file'}

inports.name: in
inports.description: Input port for receiving IPs

outports.name: out
outports.description: Output port for sending distinct IPs

core/drop.name: core/drop
core/drop.description: Packets dropper. Simply consumes IPs from the input port and 'deletes' them.

inports.name: in
inports.description: Input port for IP

inports.name: cmd
inports.description: Port for configuring a command to execute

core/joiner.name: core/joiner
core/joiner.description: Merges IPs from input array port into a single stream in the natural order of IPs arrival

inports.name: in
inports.description: Input array port

outports.name: out
outports.description: Output port with merged stream of IPs from input array

core/passthru.name: core/passthru
core/passthru.description: Forwards received IP to the output without any modifications

inports.name: in
inports.description: Input port for receiving IPs

core/readfile.name: core/readfile
core/readfile.description:
Reads a given file from the local file system line by line and emits each line into the output port.
The output data is sent as substream with open bracket IP in the beginning and close bracket IP at the end of the stream for each file.

inports.name: file
inports.description: Port for setting file path to be read from

outports.name: err
outports.description: Error port for errors opening/reading file

core/splitter.name: core/splitter
core/splitter.description: Copies received IP and sends a copy to each connected out port

inports.name: in
inports.description: Input port for receiving IPs

core/submatch.name: core/submatch
core/submatch.description: Uses a given RegEx with named capturing groups for analyzing an input string. Outputs the matched map in JSON

inports.name: pattern
inports.description: Port for RegExp patte with named capturing groups

inports.name: in
inports.description: Input port for receiving IPs

outports.name: map
outports.description: Output port for captured submatching map in JSON

core/switch.name: core/switch
core/switch.description: Receives IP on the IN port and passes it to OUT only when GATE port receives an IP

inports.name: in
inports.description: Data port

inports.name: gate
inports.description: Gate port to pass IP from data port to the output

core/template.name: core/template
core/template.description: Fill the template string with received data from the input port and pass it to the output port

inports.name: tpl
inports.description: Port for configuring component with a template

inports.name: in
inports.description: Input port for receiving IPs

core/ticker.name: core/ticker
core/ticker.description: Sends ticks (current unix timestamps) at predefined intervals to the output channel

inports.name: interval
inports.description: Configures the ticker. Accepts durations in the format: 3s, 10m, etc

debug/crasher.name: debug/crasher
debug/crasher.description: Based on pasthru component (forwarder), but exits in a couple of seconds after the start with exit code 0

inports.name: in
inports.description: Input port for receiving IPs

fs/walk.name: fs/walk
fs/walk.description: Recursively walks a given directory and sends filepaths into the output port (only files, directories are omitted)

inports.name: dir
inports.description: Directory on the file system to walk

outports.name: err
outports.description: Error port for errors walking directory

maya/click.name: maya/click
maya/click.description: Custom Maya component for clicking selector on the screen

inports.name: in
inports.description: Input port for receiving IPs

webosocket/client/ws_client.name: webosocket/client/ws_client
webosocket/client/ws_client.description: Configures a Websocket client to connect to a given server, forward incoming data to server, output receive server data to output port

inports.name: options
inports.description: Configures the Websocket server to connect to (i.e. ws://localhost:5000/ws)

inports.name: in
inports.description: Input port for receiving IPs and forwarding them to server connection

outports.name: out
outports.description: Output port for sending IPs with data received from a server

webosocket/server/ws_server.name: webosocket/server/ws_server
webosocket/server/ws_server.description: Creates a Websocket server and binds to an address/port received from options

inports.name: options
inports.description: Configures the Websocket server with address to bind to (i.e. 0.0.0.0:5000)

inports.name: in
inports.description: Input port for receiving IPs and forwarding them to the corresponding connection

outports.name: out
outports.description: Output port for sending IPs with data received from a specific connection

pythonscript.name: pythonscript
pythonscript.description: Gets a python scripts as string multipart and executes it as python binary

inports.name: script
inports.description: The python script to be executed

inports.name: script
inports.description: The python script to be executed

outports.name: out
outports.description: Output return of inputs to function entered
